instruction: What kinds of spectrum was used to retrieve apple leaf photosynthetic pigment content (LPPC)?
Output: To retrieve apple leaf photosynthetic pigment content (LPPC),the researchers used visible spectrum.

instruction: What spectral feature processing methods were used to retrieve apple leaf photosynthetic pigment content (LPPC)?
Output: Principal component analysis, Pearson’s correlation coefficient, mean decrease impurity, and variable importance in the projection were used as spectral feature processing methods to retrieve apple leaf photosynthetic pigment content (LPPC).

instruction: What metric was chosen to evaluate the performance of the ML methods to retrieve apple leaf photosynthetic pigment content (LPPC)?
Output: The metric chosen to evaluate the performance of the ML methods to retrieve apple leaf photosynthetic pigment content (LPPC) was the coefficient of determination (R-2).

instruction: What machine learning models were used in the study testing the capacity of using fractional derivative and machine learning methods to retrieve apple leaf photosynthetic pigment content (LPPC)?
Output: The machine learning models used to retrieve apple leaf photosynthetic pigment content (LPPC) were support vector regression (SVR) and other ML methods driven by the original spectra or vegetation index.

instruction: Can the fractional derivative-driven machine learning methods be used to improve the estimation of apple leaf photosynthetic pigment content (LPPC) in the related study testing the capacity of using fractional derivative and machine learning methods?
Output: Yes, the results of the study showed that fractional derivative-driven machine learning methods can be used to improve the estimation of apple leaf photosynthetic pigment content (LPPC). The fractional derivative-driven machine learning methods had higher accuracy compared to machine learning methods driven by the original spectra or vegetation index. The best estimates of chlorophyll content and carotenoid content were achieved using support vector regression (SVR) at specific fractional derivative orders. The study concluded that the fractional derivative and machine learning techniques improved the estimation of apple LPPC.
